title: Gossip! The Prince and the Dragon, That Shameless Couple - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Dragons   European Ambience   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Medieval   Mob Protagonist   Royalty   Short Story   Shounen-Ai Subplot
author: Yuán tián   元甜   圆甜
description:
I am a princess.

After going through all the troubles of waiting for a dragon, the dragon asked me, “Can you help me unscrew this cap?” So I snatched up the dragon, and finally found a prince – who took out his sword and carried the dragon back to his palace.

Dammit, I have to go back to be the queen regnant.>
